Package structure

Class Tree

java.lang.Object
structure.Graph
structure.Tree
public class Tree
extends Graph
This Class extends the Graph, this happens because a tree is a type of graph but minimally connected. It starts by applying the Prim algorithm, it assigns the root to the first feature of the HashMap and goes through all the edges picking the one with the heaviest weight for every connection. With the final tree completed we compute the Theta_ijkc and Theta_c for every connection, to be later used in the Naive Bayes Classifier.

    • calcThetas

      public void calcThetas()
      Function that computes all the thetas for the final tree in all the possible situations The situations include the root and all the sets of parent/child, also calls the function that computes the Theta_C for the class node.

      Stores every Theta in the parent node, same as done before for computing the Ns.
